titles.title: Federal Rotational Cyber Workforce Program Act of 2019
Federal Rotational Cyber Workforce Program Act of 2019
Federal Rotational Cyber Workforce Program Act of 2019
Federal Rotational Cyber Workforce Program Act of 2019
A bill to establish a Federal rotational cyber workforce program for the Federal cyber workforce.
Federal Rotational Cyber Workforce Program Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with an amendment. With written report No. 116-15.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 46.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
